title: Risk factors for arrhythmias occurred in cancer patients after chemotherapy: An evidence-based systematic review and meta-analysis
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Qian-Qian Xu, Song-Jie Han, Xiao-Hong Wei, Liang-zhen You, Li-Chao Sun, Hong-Cai Shang
